programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@12
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Food Truck Road Trip Ep8
programme.desc: Watch the adventures of two friends, Azree & Kojak, on a journey in their Food Trucks as they drive from Miri to Kuching, making stops along the way. The duo cook dishes using locally sourced ingredients, and have misadventures as they discover new places while selling great food.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Khazanah Kenyalang S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dokumentari mengangkat 39 buah koleksi khazanah terbaik negeri Sarawak - yang tersimpan di Arkib Sarawak sebagai khazanah yang signifikan dan bertaraf dunia.

programme.title: Delivery Girl Ep2
programme.desc: Drama komedi ringan yang menampilkan tiga gadis sekawan; LIVAN, MILAH & DOR yang bekerja sebagai gadis penghantar makanan dengan aplikasi yang dibangunkan sebuah startup tempatan bernama Smart Pertiwi.

programme.title: Sine Siti Makan Ep1
programme.desc: Siti, travels around Sarawak and find stalls and shops that sells food and talks to the owner about the specials

programme.title: Halik Ep64
programme.desc: Childhood lovers Jacky and Lino meet after being apart for several years. However, now married to different people, the two must choose whether to fight to be together again or be true to the promise made to their spouses.

programme.title: Fight for My Way Ep13
programme.desc: Ko Dong Man, a former taekwondo champion, and Choi Ae Ra, a receptionist, struggle to follow their dreams as life throws obstacles in their path.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@4:55
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Rezeki Tanah Ep1
programme.desc: TVS mempersembahkan siri dokumentari Rezeki Tanah yang mengisahkan kecekalan 13 orang insan yang sanggup berkotor dan merisikokan diri untuk mencari rezeki, tidak kira daripada hasil hutan mahupun cucuk tanam demi kelangsungan hidup dan keluarga tercinta.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Ngenjen Di Semandin Ep5
programme.desc: KISAH bermula dengan Bang Bujang dan Matt memancing di hulu sungai sambil santai, Bang Bujang menceritakan pengalaman dari zaman remaja sehingga pertengahan umur beliau.

programme.title: Borneo's Unique Building Ep7
programme.desc: Siri dokumentari yang memfokuskan kepada senibina bangunan dan infrastruktur di Sarawak, yang menampilkan dua binaan iaitu satu senibina moden/kontemporari dan satu lagi senibina tradisi/kolonial.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: Sukan TVS Ep8
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan, perbincangan dan topik hangat sukan tanah air

programme.title: (DL) Menarik Sepuluh
programme.desc: Menarik Sepuluh mengumpulkan 10 kisah unik dan menarik berlaku di mana sahaja

programme.title: (L) UTAMA
programme.desc: UTAMA merupakan segmen berita utama yang memaparkan Berita Terkini di seluruh Malaysia dan dunia.

programme.title: (L) Tempat Kita
programme.desc: Mengetengahkan laporan mengenai keindahan serta lokasi menarik di dalam negeri.

programme.title: Anggun Ep7
programme.desc: Anggun is a live women talk show (10 episodes) that will be discussing current affairs and/or trending topics surrounding women empowerment, involvements and achievements.

programme.title: Bario Permata Di Pergunungan Ep2
programme.desc: Pengenalan kepada bario-tanah tinggi kelabit. Kedudukannya dalam peta sarawak. Kemudahan perjalanan darat dan udara. Panorama gunung-ganang, cuaca yang nyaman (bario disebut bariew) bermaksud angin.

programme.title: Agritek S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Setiap episode 1 atau 2 orang usahawan dari bumi kenyalang akan membawa penonton untuk melawat ke tapak tempat mereka melakukan pengusahaan agriculture.

programme.title: The Cloth Story S2 Ep11
programme.desc: The Cloth Story season 2 focuses on textiles, such as Pua, Songket, Tenun, Batik and Keringkam from the Borneo region. The cloth, the raw materials, the artisans, the history, the evolution and so much more.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Fight for My Way Ep14
programme.desc: Ko Dong Man, a former taekwondo champion, and Choi Ae Ra, a receptionist, struggle to follow their dreams as life throws obstacles in their path.

programme.title: Misteri Kedai Gunting Ep5
programme.desc: Kisah misteri yang dihantar oleh individu yang pernah mengalami peristiwa seram dan diceritakan semula oleh pencerita di dalam sebuah kedai gunting.

programme.title: Lensa Kenyalang Ep1
programme.desc: Lensa Kenyalang showcases evolving aesthetic of photography as seen throughthe lense of visual creator.

programme.title: Nature XCO & Downhill Ep12
programme.desc: Program pertandingan sukan basikal lasak yang dianjurkan oleh Broad Vision Solution Sdn.Bhd dengan kerjasama Persatuan Basikal Sarawak dan Sarawak Sports Cooperation bersama Kerajaan Negeri Sarawak.

programme.title: Suara Alam Borneo Ep10
programme.desc: Suara Alam Borneo akan mengupasnya hutan hujan tropika berusia jutaan tahun secara terperinci dengan pelbagai spesis flora dan juga fauna menerusi informasi yang mudah difahami.

programme.title: The Last Highlanders Of Borneo Ep1
programme.desc: Travel series presented by Hiker and Explorer, Ian Vong across two remote regions of northeast of Sarawak, namely Bario and Ba'kelalan. and closely following the indigenous tribes of the Orang-Ulu, particularly the Kelabit and Lun Bawang people.

programme.title: Past, Present & Future Ep4
programme.desc: Hidden throughout Sarawak are unsung heroes who are striving to preserve, share and expand local arts, customs and lifestyles to the world

programme.title: Food Truck Road Trip Ep8
programme.desc: Watch the adventures of two friends, Azree & Kojak, on a journey in their Food Trucks as they drive from Miri to Kuching, making stops along the way. The duo cook dishes using locally sourced ingredients, and have misadventures as they discover new places while selling great food.

programme.title: Khazanah Kenyalang S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Dokumentari mengangkat 39 buah koleksi khazanah terbaik negeri Sarawak - yang tersimpan di Arkib Sarawak sebagai khazanah yang signifikan dan bertaraf dunia.

programme.title: Rezeki Tanah Ep1

programme.title: Delivery Girl Ep2

programme.title: Hantu The Musical Ep10
programme.desc: Four friends realize an old house, Teratak Kelana, is related to the spate of disappearances that have been occurring. They investigate & find it haunted by the spirit of its dead owner, The Old Pawang.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@7
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Cigu! Nadai Bisi Utai Ep12
programme.desc: Halim, seorang guru muda lepasan maktab berusia 25 tahun dari Selangor, dilema menerima tawaran mengajar di sekolah rendah di pedalaman Sarawak. Ibu dan tunang menentang, tetapi bapanya menyokong.

programme.title: Menghilir Rajang S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Kehidupan penduduk yang tinggal di sepanjang sungai Rajang, Sarawak. Kedudukan geografinya yang strategik menjadikan sungai ini sebagai sumber ekonomi, pendidikan, perhubungan dan produk pelancongan

programme.title: Jarum & Benang Ep9
programme.desc: Fatin & Juna merupakan kawan baik yang lahir di kampung yang sama. Mereka berdua merupakan pereka fesyen yang terkenal tetapi kejayaan mereka tidak disenangi oleh Wida,seorang pereka veteran.

programme.title: Take Me To Sarawak Ep1
programme.desc: This travelogue aims to take viewers, both locals and tourists, to places that you may not have heard of, but definitely have to see, experience and taste

programme.title: Legasi Seni Ep1
programme.desc: Discover Sarawakian Musicians (composers, arrangers, singers) from different backgrounds and generations, and letting them to talk about their life journey through music, influences, philosophies and techniques

programme.title: Khemah Kita Bah Ep6
programme.desc: Program ini dianggap sebagai "camping for dummies", dimana hos dan rakannya akan memberi dan menunjukkan tip-tip asas berkhemah, larangan dan langkah-langkah yang perlu diambil serta pendekatan memasak "outdoor" yang ringkas.

programme.title: Journey of The Bidayuh Ep2
programme.desc: James Ritchie will take us to discover more about the Bidayuh. A documentary series that will touch on the aspects of Bidayuh culture, tradition, history and where this race fares in todays world.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: Stories In Motion Ep6
programme.desc: Five choreographers in Sarawak are given two weeks to create a story using a surprise 'wildcard style', incorporating unique Sarawak genres or styles.

programme.title: Cooking Orang Bujang S2 Ep20
programme.desc: FattahBolh akan menunjukkan menu masakan orang bujang yang sedap dan mudah untuk dicuba golongan masyarakat. Anda pasti teruja dengan nama & masakan yang mudah untuk dijadikan sebagai panduan orang ramai.

programme.title: Hassan
programme.desc: Hassan ialah seorang anak yatim yang tinggal bersama abang tirinya, Fuad. Tiada sesiapa yang menyukai Hassan termasuk Fuad, Jah dan kanak-kanak lain. Mereka sering memberikan layanan buruk kepada Hassan hanya kerana rupanya yang selekeh. Namun, Hassan tidak pernah ambil kisah. Pak Samad, suami kepada Jah sering mempelawa Hasan untuk menjamu makanan sedap yang dimasak oleh Jah. Malahan, Hassan juga berkawan baik dengan anak perempuan mereka, Liya. Suatu hari, Fuada terlibat dalam kemalangan kecil. Hassan telah menjaganya dengan teliti. Sejak itu, Fuad menyedari kebaikan daripada Hassan dan bukannya penampilan fizikalnya yang kurang menarik.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep74
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep90
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Istri Yang Tidak Benar-Benar Dicintai Oleh Suaminya
programme.desc: Selepas kemalangan kereta itu, Citra menjadi buta. Dia dianggap tidak mampu melayani suaminya Johan, dan ibu mertuanya menekan Johan untuk berkahwin dengan Priska. Akankah Citra mampu bertahan atau akan berpisah dengan Johan?

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep180
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Tamu Idola Ep3
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan realiti yang mengejutkan di mana artis memasuki dunia peminat mereka, dengan mengunjungi mereka secara tiba-tiba. Penonton dapat melihat momen intim ketika artis terlibat dalam rutinitas rutin harian dan pengalaman para peminat setia mereka.

programme.title: Inbox 2022 Ep6
programme.desc: Rancangan varia muzik yang mengandungi muzik, permainan dan aktiviti yang menyeronokkan.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep75

programme.title: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama Ep2
programme.desc: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama adalah konsert besar yang menandakan ulang tahun ke-29 Indosiar, stesen televisyen Indonesia yang terkenal. Acara ini berlangsung selama dua malam. Konsert ini adalah paparan hebat bakat Indonesia, dengan persembahan dari pelbagai artis dari pelbagai genre. Acara ini dianjurkan oleh sembilan hos popular dalam industri hiburan Indonesia. Konsert ini bukan sahaja sambutan perjalanan dan pencapaian Indosiar selama hampir tiga dekad, tetapi juga mempamerkan kepelbagaian dan kekayaan budaya Indonesia.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama Ep2
programme.desc: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama adalah konsert besar yang menandakan ulang tahun ke-29 Indosiar, stesen televisyen Indonesia yang terkenal. programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep14
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: Guru Desa Pengrajin Sapu Lidi Yang Ingin Memajukan Desa
programme.desc: Semasa sedang mengajar, kelas Ratna tiba-tiba diusir kerana tidak membayar sewa. Semua peralatan rosak, dan Ratna cuba membeli yang baru tetapi tidak mempunyai wang yang mencukupi. Zaki datang dan meminjamkan wang kepadanya. Zaki mencadangkan agar Ratna mula menjual penyapu lidi.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep182
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep30
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Elite attorney Kang Seong-hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.

programme.title: For The Emperor
programme.desc: Former baseball player involved in fixing game was recruited to work for private loan company. He also falls for bar owner Yeon-Soo, and slowly unleashes his endless desire and ambition...

programme.title: The Foul King
programme.desc: A timid bank clerk discovers his talent as a wrestler by ways of cheating that no one had thought of. Yet frustrated to win solely by tricks, he decided to master moves in becoming a real wrestler.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Polices Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: An aspiring news anchor and a struggling wrestler meets by chance at a burger joint. Through shared meals, they encourage each other to reach for their dreams!

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: Um Bok-dong, a cyclist who won a match during the Japanese colonial era, alerts the colonial authorities and galvanizes the locals, especially freedom fighters who have invested in the races.

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: Voice phishing victim infiltrates into the organisation's call center to recover the money, yet discovered another large scale scam ahead...

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.title: I (2021)
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: Birthday
programme.desc: A family struggle to cope with the loss of their son in the Sewol ferry disaster. When his birthday approaches, they reminisce their memories of him.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: Cadaver
programme.desc: 6 med students participate in their first anatomy class, yet nightmare begins when they are assigned with a deadly beautiful cadaver.

programme.title: The Tenor - Lirico Spinto
programme.desc: A strong partnership and friendship begins when a talented Korean vocalist met a Japanese music producer. At the peak of his career, he was diagnosed with thyroid cancer and might loss his voice...

programme.title: Mission: Possible
programme.desc: A cash-strapped private investigator Woo Su-Han is retained by a secret agent Yoo Da-Hee to bring down a high risk arms trafficking operation.

programme.title: 1987: When The Day Comes
programme.desc: In 1987, a pro-democracy student activist was captured and tortured to death by the police. The authorities tried to cover up the case, but the ordinary people fight to reveal the truth.

programme.title: The Roundup
programme.desc: 4 years after the events of Garibong district round up operation, Geumcheon Polices Major Crimes Unit is given a mission to repatriate a fugitive who fled to Vietnam.

programme.title: I (2021)
programme.desc: Ah-Young who grew up in an orphanage becomes the babysitter of Young-Chae, who is raising a 6-month-old child on her own. One day, her child has an accident and she places all the blame on Ah-Young...

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A man bears the responsibility to take care of a deaf-blind girl unexpectedly, which turns out to be life-changing to both of them.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: Um Bok-dong, a cyclist who won a match during the Japanese colonial era, alerts the colonial authorities and galvanizes the locals, especially freedom fighters who have invested in the races.

programme.title: Gate
programme.desc: A group of five conspired for one last heist, yet secrets inside the vault are large enough to overthrow the country.

programme.title: The Player 2: Master of Swindlers Ep7
programme.desc: <Player> returns with Season 2! 5 elite con artists join hands to catch lawbreakers who get away with crime by money and power.

programme.title: Dreaming of a Freaking Fairy Tale Ep7
programme.desc: An arrogant Prince Charming who doesn't believe in love clashes with a girl who dreams of a Cinderella-like romance. Despite their differences, a surprising romantic journey unfolds between them.

programme.title: Dreaming of a Freaking Fairy Tale Ep8
programme.desc: An arrogant Prince Charming who doesn't believe in love clashes with a girl who dreams of a Cinderella-like romance. Despite their differences, a surprising romantic journey unfolds between them.

programme.title: World Dice Tour2 Ep13
programme.desc: A dice decides travel destination! The cast members will start their trip right away according to the dice. Let's start an unpredictable world tour with World Dice Tour2!

programme.title: GBRB: reap what you sow Ep7
programme.desc: Actors Lee Kwang-soo, Kim Woo-bin, Doh Kyung-soo and Kim Ki-bang, who are best friends in real life, experiencing and enjoying rural life in a remote FARM while taking part in organic harvesting.

programme.title: Spring Camp Ep8

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep73
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep211
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1046
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Fallen Angels
programme.desc: The funkier cousin to Chungking Express, director Wong Kar Wai looks at five fallen angels who suffer love and loss amidst the crime and chaos of Hong Kongs neon nights in this movie. Karen Mok won Best Supporting Actress in the 15th Hong Kong Film Awards for her remarkable role as a broken-hearted party girl.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Flying Dragon Leaping Tiger
programme.desc: Lu the horse thief is betrayed by his best mate Qiao and is separated from his son. Lus wife blames him for it and takes Qiaos daughter away as revenge. For 20 years, Lu searches for his wife until one day, his missing son meets Qiaos daughter and they fall in love. Will their hatred pass on to the next generation?

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: Monkey King is tasked with escorting Monk Tang on his journey to the West to retrieve the scriptures. During the trip, Monk Tang is being targeted by the seductive yet deadly White Bone Spirit, who feeds on the innocents to gain immortality. Monkey King will have to fight the White Bone Spirit in order to save Monk Tang!

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: That Man In Chang-an
programme.desc: The Han Emperor dies and his Empress Lu seizes the ruling power. She plots to kill the heir to the throne, Liu Heng, but the masked warrior discovers her plot and tips off Liu. Liu sends his princess to Chang An to ask for help. The masked warrior protects the princess from attackers along the way and supports Liu to become the new Emperor.

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Gambler's Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: A Friend from Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: Trilogy Of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: A kung fu anthology film consisting of three stories: a man embarrasses himself while trying to prove his worth to the father of the woman he loves; a courtesan in love with a general will need to deliver a notorious bandit in exchange for him not being executed; and a group of bandits forms a plan to rescue a new friend from being executed.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Chehs epic The Water Margin, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: Pursuit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Kung Fu legend Ti Lung stars in the action movie as Fu Xue Hong, embarking on a epic journey of revenge for his father.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Mings guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.desc: Sophia is engaged to millionaire Karan who is completely in love with her. However, when she meets her true love, Vicky, and starts seeing him secretly, her relationship with Karan suffers.

programme.title: Kotwal Saab
programme.desc: Bharat, a police officer, tries to arrest a corrupt politician but gets to his henchman, Mahesh, first. However, Bharat's life turns upside down when Mahesh reveals his relationship with his wife.

programme.title: Fauladi Policewala
programme.desc: Ibrahim, a police inspector, gets posted in a village with a very low crime rate. In pursuit of an adventurous life, he plans to obtain a transfer with the help of local thugs, but his plan backfires.

programme.title: Banphool
programme.desc: Haria, a man who lives on a tea estate with his grandmother, falls in love with Gulabi. However, this attracts the jealousy of Ajay, the son of the estate's owner.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: Dr Anmol, a dentist and henpecked husband, lives a miserable existence in New York due to his domineering wife. However, his troubles increase when he unwittingly gets embroiled in a mafia rivalry.

programme.title: Chalte Chalte
programme.desc: Raj, the owner of a truck company, pursues Priya, a fashion designer, and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a separation that threatens to destroy their relationship.

programme.title: Kasam
programme.desc: Kisna, a police officer, goes undercover in a village to expose a drug ring. He manages to convince the villagers to surrender but things take a turn when the police guns down the villagers.

programme.title: Beta
programme.desc: Raju, a young man, is devoted to his stepmother as he only wishes to be showered with motherly love. However, his stepmother exploits his love to extort his wealth.

programme.title: Dil Ka Rishta

programme.title: Pyar Ki Ladai
programme.desc: A jobless man spends his time doing unfruitful things, but his life changes when he falls in love with the sister of a sarpanch. However, to marry her, he must win a kabaddi match.

programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson has been framed for a fire on The Pearl. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building...above the fire line.

programme.title: Pandorum
programme.desc: Two crew members wake up on an abandoned spacecraft with no idea who they are, how long they've been asleep, or what their mission is. Soon after, they discover they're not alone, and the situation is more horrifying than they ever could have imagined.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Thailand - Ben travels to Thailand to meet Paul and Sao, who he first visited in Cambodia. Paul and his family have build their version of an English castle.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Discover how refreshing Freezies can stay fresh for 820 days; how the best moisture levels are achieved to make pasta-perfect parmesan cheese; why ripe bananas make banana chocolate chip bars that smell and taste sensational.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Discover how 9.7 billion cups of Danone's Activia yogurt are made every year; how to make trail mix both healthy and delicious; why less mixing makes more tasty organic baby cookies; and why timing is everything when making powerhouse mushroom rice veggie burgers.

programme.title: Mammals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Cold - From ice-covered seas to snow-capped mountains, mammals have conquered the cold, living in the harshest places on earth, thanks to their remarkable intelligence and adaptations.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chiang Mai to the River Kwai - Michael Portillo embarks on a two-part adventure through Thailand. Michael helps out at an elephant hospital, tries his hand at the art of umbrella-making and learns about northern Thai cuisine.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Flash floods tear through Maryland in the US, a couple get stranded in a Himalayan blizzard, and a boat race is besieged by a rare weather phenomenon.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the arribada, or arrival. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs. In Turtle Beach, new discoveries abound, as Canadian naturalist and cameraman Hugo Kitching follows a team of international scientists on a groundbreaking expedition to uncover the mysteries of this rare phenomenon.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands 1 - Summer on the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Explore a 1,500-year-old monastery among the dizzying crags of the world-famous Skellig Islands. Spy Manx shearwaters and humpback whales, then chase after pygmy shrews on Clare before heading to the Aran Islands for a peek at an autumn spectacle.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - The Hauraki Gulf/ Te Moananui a Toi Ep4
programme.desc: Take a deep dive into the teeming waters of the Hauraki Gulf, near Auckland, New Zealand, and explore a true paradise for ocean creatures. Catch a glimpse of a stealthy manta ray, enjoy dolphin antics, and admire a kaleidoscope of tropical fish.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Spring Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Baby Animals - Prequel 1 - Raising Babies Ep7
programme.desc: Follow the staff at Parc Omega in Quebec, Canada, during the busy spring when moose, boars, raccoons, and visiting Canada geese have their babies.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - The Young Ones Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode of Amazing Animal Friends a rescued orphaned rhino befriended by a playful dog and doting sheep, a big bunny rabbit that babysits boisterous baby lambs, and a porcupine that helps two English bulldogs rehabilitate injured animals.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 - Invisible Signals Ep3
programme.desc: Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - A Close Encounter Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the heat as rising temps mean that water is getting scarce. The Manzi pack must stand alongside predators to hydrate at a remaining precious water spot. Hunt with Wekas pack to feed the pups, and watch the Stork Colony thrive against all odds.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Weatherproof Ep1
programme.desc: Steer clear of these alphas, whose horns, claws, and other protective gear keep them ready for battle, no matter what the weather dishes out. Examine killer Highland cow horns, plucky mallard bills, razor-edged wolverine claws, and more.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Stork Pack in Trouble Ep3
programme.desc: Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Beast Buddies Ep4
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Three Kings Islands/ Manawatāwhi Ep5
programme.desc: Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Jasper, Terry, and Gumbo Ep6
programme.desc: Embrace an invasive nutria whos become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, and visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum. Explore a swimmers bond with wild gray seals and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.desc: Its spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 - Three Kings Islands/ Manawatāwhi Ep5
programme.desc: Delve into the strange magic of the Three Kings Islands, a remote archipelago north of New Zealand. Swim with a pod of bottlenose dolphins, join short-tailed stingrays on a hunt, and feel the tension as a gang of predatory orcas arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Rescuers Ep1

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 - Beast Buddies Ep4
programme.desc: Meet more Amazing Animal Friends, an animal shelter puppy that helps a captive cheetah cub get ready for the wild, and an injured monkey who wins over a pack of unfriendly dogs and a lonely mongoose that enjoys foraging with a flock of sheep.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Stork Pack in Trouble Ep3
