programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep11
programme.desc: Catch Me If You Sam / Toy Driver - Its Tag and Scoochs first day of Race Cadets and Sam Whippet tells the Cadets that whoever can catch him in a race will be the new team captain. \ When Mom donates a box of Tags old toys to the new daycare center, Tag decides that the only way to get her box of toys back is to go around town collecting toys to swap out for her toys.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep11
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Toy Wash - Fuse is heartbroken when his new special toy wash is broken. Right before Revs could have a wash in it too! Noddy decides to investigate and help the little robot find out who has broken it. Using all his investigating skills and collecting evidence with the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that it's his own best beloved car, Revs, who broke the toy wash! Poor Revs thought that if he went through the toy wash he'd miss his special time with Noddy and Bumpy. Noddy finds a way for Revs to enjoy the toy wash AND still has his special playtime with his best friends. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep11
programme.desc: Scritch Scratch - Raa Raa always scratches his claws in the morning, but his scratching post has fallen apart. He sets off to find himself a new one in the jungliest bit. When he does eventually find a new scratching post it is huge, how is he going to get it home again?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep7
programme.desc: A Wanderer in Paris - Odlulu has a magical shrinking key in France and has set her sights on the Great Race. Wally and Wenda help local racer Jacques after Odlulu shrunk his and everyone else's bikes.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep35
programme.desc: Maggotron/Love Hurts - Skid unleashes an evil robot on Turbotown and has to get rid of the monster himself; Turbo falls for and betroths a head-eating mantis princess.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep35
programme.desc: Eggs - Ton-Ton and the Trux must protect a cluster of fragile Ankylodump eggs from the Scraptors after an earthquake separates them from their herd

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep35
programme.desc: Humanspeople Safari / Happy Space Troopers - Oh introduces Tip to the strange world of Boovian Earth tours; Rejected by the Junior Lady Rangers, Oh and Tip form their own all-inclusive scouts, sparking a turf war

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep29
programme.desc: Lucky and the Big Goodbye - While Lucky attempts to win over a town that is unwelcoming to the circus, she starts to question her own reasoning to stay

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep30
programme.desc: Lucky and the Two-Wheeled Terror - When Lucky and the PALs arrive home from the circus, they find that Maricela and her new bicycle have become the star attraction in Miradero

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep21
programme.desc: Grug V Gurg / Unfair Fair - Grug wants a day off from his honey-do-list so he subs in doppelganger Gurg/Eep and Thunk set out to sabotage Bulk and Sulk's "idea fair" project because they always win even though Snoot comes up with the ideas.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off / The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep20
programme.desc: El Apasionado Negocio de la Niera - Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep35
programme.desc: Tone Death - After the Riders save a Deathsong egg from the Dragon Hunters, they must take it back to Melody Island when the hatched baby won't stop crying.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep9
programme.desc: Big Poppy / Neighbor War - When a troll starts to ruin the fun of open mic night Poppy is forced to enter a compliment battle.Branch tries to drive Sky Toronto away when he moves next door.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep35
programme.desc: Fast Food Lemur Nation - Tired of waiting so long for his meals, King Julien introduces fast food to the kingdom, but the side effects are not what he expected.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep24
programme.desc: Play It Again, Tim - When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep26
programme.desc: Wrinkles & Stickles - After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep17
programme.desc: The Beast of the Wasteland - Po and the Kids are once more waylaid, this time by Mole Rats who have deemed Bao their god. But when Bao isn't able to defeat the mythical creature plaguing the Wasteland, Fan Tong steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep18
programme.desc: Danger in the Forbidden City - Po and the Kids finally arrive in the Forbidden City. After an assassination scare, Xiao enlists Po and the 4Cs for help protecting her during her father's funeral.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep50
programme.desc: Little Lamb - When Puss and Dulcinea tracked down the Grotto of Riches, they each have their own plan on how to convince Mary and her flock to help find the Obelisk

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep50
programme.desc: Blindsided - A huge storm hits Dragon's Edge causing the Dragons to spook and run off but when Astrid is blinded, Hiccup must lead her to Stormfly.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJs birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep50
programme.desc: Koto, Plain And Tall - Julien is lost in the jungle and accidentally saves a Mountain Lemur named Koto who turns out to be the biggest threat the kingdom has ever faced

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep24
programme.desc: Stayin' Alive - Allura returns to the Balmera to gather a giant crystal when a familiar foe reawakens

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep50
programme.desc: My Big Fat Gran Wedding / The Strutting Edge - After being called out for having commitment issues by Grug, Gran decides to make the ultimate commitment: marrying Mow!; After embarrassingly choking at the prior Valley's beastie Pageant, Eep asks previous winner Gran to train her to be the best

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep24
programme.desc: Dome Sweet Dome / My Pet Clamsquatch - Chet accidentally trades all of the town's tomatoes to the devious Ace Gecko and the FAST crew has to outsmart the lizard in order to get them back. // Skidmark has been secretly keeping a clamsquatch as a pet and it's up to the crew to protect the creature from a nefarious secret organization.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep76
programme.desc: Inspector Stingo - Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep24
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Animals - All the farm animals have run away from the farm and are causing chaos in Toy Green. Noddy launches his investigation and discovers that the farm gate was left open by mistake. Using his wwwbook and asking questions, Noddy follows all the clues and discovers that the Pockets left the farm gate open by mistake when they were playing with the animals. With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm. And this time he makes sure the farm gate is shut properly! Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo's Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep11
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Toy Wash - Fuse is heartbroken when his new special toy wash is broken. Right before Revs could have a wash in it too! Noddy decides to investigate and help the little robot find out who has broken it. Using all his investigating skills and collecting evidence with the WhoWhatWhere Tablet Noddy realises that it's his own best beloved car, Revs, who broke the toy wash! Poor Revs thought that if he went through the toy wash he'd miss his special time with Noddy and Bumpy. Noddy finds a way for Revs to enjoy the toy wash AND still has his special playtime with his best friends. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep21
programme.desc: Mum's The Word - Christine (Big Chris' mum) is visiting Silver hatch. As is Mamma Mia serious competition ensues!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep22
programme.desc: How The Hatch Was Won - Tin Top is feeling homesick so Big Chris tries to cheer him up. But who could that pesky varmint causing trouble on the track be?!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep21
programme.desc: Why Rhino Charges - You see there was a time when Rhino didn't charge and he couldn't see very well at all. Poor old Rhino really wanted to be invited to the Dance of the Horns up on the plains with Buffalo and all the other horned animals. But Rhino didn't have a horn, so he wasn't allowed. The Monkeys decide to help Rhino and make him a horn from a piece of old wood. But when Rhino wakes up he doesn't know what it is. Aargh! Thing on the end of my nose! CHAAaarge!' And that's Why Rhino Charges. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep22
programme.desc: Why Caterpillar Is Never In A Hurry - You see Caterpillar was never in a hurry. When all the animals were racing around Tinga Tinga getting ready for the Best-dressed parade, Caterpillar was happy to sit in a tree and munch on leaves saying Po-le, po-le, slowly, slowly, good things come to those who wait'. Then one day the rains come and Caterpillar disappears into a cocoon. What's happening?' questions Elephant. Wait and see' says Tortoise wisely Wait and See'. Then Caterpillar transforms into the most beautiful butterfly ever!... But who wins the Best-dressed parade? Tales from Africa

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep13
programme.desc: Chaser And Chewer / Recipe For Adventure - Tag and Scooch pretend to be their favorite comic book heroes and help the dogs of Pawston. But when Frank and Beans pretend to be villains its up to Chaser and Chewer to stop the trouble makers and save the day. \ Its Bring Your Own Bowl Night at the Barker house, and Tag and Grandmaw team up to make Great Great Auntie Eunice's Famous Far Fetched Cookies. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep64
programme.desc: The Day After Yesterday - King Julien's attempts to destroy Koto were unsuccessful but the allies he's formed all come to help out, and Koto's wedding turns into all-out battle

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep17
programme.desc: Hide The Lightning - Po and team go to the city of Tikal to get more information on the Protector, but it's easier said than done, since nobody in the town actually knows the identity of the Protector. Blade becomes increasingly frustrated and Po attempts to help her.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep64
programme.desc: Through Caverns Measureless - When the gang chases Li'l Pequena into the portal, everyone but Puss gets super-powers and must join forces with a sorceress to overthrow the Blind King

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep24
programme.desc: Mad About Madagascar - The Wanderers travel to Madagascar to get fresh vanilla for Wizard Flamb. Odlulu is already there; using the Bouncy-Bounce Key to build an ice cream parlor up in a Baobab tree! Before Odlulu gives up the key, Woof playfully takes it and starts a game of game of catch-me-if-you-can. They must catch Woof before the entire island of Madagascar is turned into a bouncy house.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep12
programme.desc: Ottos - When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools' home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep12
programme.desc: Furious Fun - The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep6
programme.desc: Playground / Sparkless - Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelps fun-crastinating puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep13
programme.desc: The Glitter Guide / Piano Panic - When the Dews find out their glitter guide (an older Dew Drop) is coming to visit, they bend over backwards to make a great first impression, but end up forgetting some of their responsiblities in the process. / When a string breaks on Marcus piano before his recital and he cant practice, the Dews must lead Marcus to a new piano.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ians lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep12
programme.desc: Frank and Beans with Chili / Little Hound on the Prairie - Beans is nervous that Frank is starting to make a new best friend, so Beans enlists Tag to help him win Frank back. \ Grandpaw and Grandmaw tell Tag the story of the early days of Pawston. Tags ancestor, Tagatha, built a steam-engine and turned Pawston from a one-house town into a thriving community.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep12
programme.desc: The Case Of The Dazzle Dragon - Everyone in Fable Fields is very worried that a new Dazzle Dragon has appeared in the land. Big Ears says there's no such thing as a Dragon in Toyland so Noddy decides to investigate. All the evidence seems to lead to a dragon footprints, loud noises and glimpses of shiny scales in the woods but clever Noddy thinks it through and, using his investigating skills of looking and looking again, soon realises that the dragon' isn't a dragon at all! It's the knights out on patrol in their shiny armour and tight formation! Phew! Thanks Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep12
programme.desc: Hurry Up Raa Raa - Raa Raa has agreed to do too many things with too many people today. Will he be able to do them and keep all his friends happy? More importantly, will it make him happy?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica... IN COLOR! - When Wizard Whitebeard receives a postcard from Costa Rica, Wenda -- a bird-lover with an encyclopedic knowledge of rare birds -- notices that the birds in the postcard have lost their color! Wally and Wenda head to the Costa Rican rain forest to investigate alongside Wizard Featherbeard.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep36
programme.desc: Ransom Of White Shadow/Kicked Off - White Shadow is mistaken for a celebrity snail and kidnapped; Tito gets a foosball table which quickly becomes a soccer battle ground.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep36
programme.desc: Pounder - Ty and the crew must protect the Flatirons from Pounder, a predatory Poundersaurolophus who marks his territory by hammering everything in sight

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep36
programme.desc: Krebbles Is Real / Tip's Diary - When Oh thinks that his favorite TV show is real, Tip tries to maintain the illusion; When Tip's diary gets boring for Oh, he decides to create drama in her life to liven up his favorite book

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep31
programme.desc: Lucky and the Rough Ride - The PALs join AI and Javier on a mustang drive, but when Javier gets injured, its up to Lucky and Spirit to get him to safety

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep32
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ghostly Gotcha! - When Snips claims not to be afraid of ghosts, the PALs decide to give him a fun Halloween scare hell never forget!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep23
programme.desc: Croodtopia / Hand On A Hard Egg - When the adults come down with the sneezles, the kids (including Lerk and Womp) use the chance to create their own society ("you-topia") with no rules, but Eep and Thunk disagree on how to run it/Food is scarce and when a large egg is spotted on the hunting field, Grug, Eep, Snoot, Munk and Squawk call dibbs. It's decided that whoever is tough enough to be the last holding on, wins the food.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep24
programme.desc: Disaster Of Puppets / Love Will Eep Us Together - Thunk invents ventriloquism when he tries (and fails) at stand-up comedy, but he gets jealous when Ahhh! Valley thinks the puppet is the real comedian/Eep is determined for two buffalippos to find love when Grug denies her dating privileges.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first missionand then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - Theres a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep36
programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep10
programme.desc: Remote Out of Control / Critter Comfort - Biggie takes Branchs superpowered remote but must return it before Branch finds outWhen Poppy builds a new home for a group of cute critters she accidentally attracts their predators.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep30
programme.desc: The Coo Chi Coup - Boss Baby loves awards- and the Golden Rattle trophy is no exception. When presented with the chance to win an award at a company retreat;he must choose between his pride and his team.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevins jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedians disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep51
programme.desc: The Obelisk - When time is running out for Puss to find the Obelisk, he must fight El Moco and finds out who The One from the Great Prophecy is

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep34
programme.desc: Dog Loves Camping - Dog and Pug decide to go holiday and use Granny Pug's guide to camping. They visit a music festival, a jungle and they go to the top of a mountain.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - During a game of hide and seek, Monty wonders whether there is a way to hide other than in or behind something.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep23
programme.desc: It's time for autumn leaves - JoJo needs to find different-coloured leaves to complete her nature tick-book, but can't find a green one. Luckily, Gran Gran has a plan that involves a special leaf rubbing!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Odd Ball - Rain stops play when Bo, Jo and Mo want a game of Odd Ball and Logi-Po is out of his depth looking after the three Kid Po!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Road To Nowhere - Every Po wants to drive to Awesome Land amusement park... but the Blockers road runs out at the edge of the Po Mountain range! How will Team Tinpo solve this problem?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Horsey Ride - When Bluey forgets to put her favourite toy away, Socks grabs it! The kids stage a horsey wedding to distract her, with Dad and Uncle Stripe as the horses!

programme.desc: The Imagination Badge - When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.desc: The Recipe Badge - The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.desc: The Nature Badge - The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC284MakhachevvsVolkanovski
programme.desc: At UFC 284, featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski sought a new challenge and a second belt by challenging lightweight champion Islam Makhachev. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their title bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep607BattlegroundsLAWMMAUnbreakableBonfimWarriorCodeCalvinKattar
programme.desc: We visit legendary coach Ray Longo in Long Island to get a better look at the history of LAW MMA and the champions hes produced. We learn about the Unbreakable bond between these two brothers who shared a dream of fighting in the UFC. UFC featherweight Calvin Kattar shares his keys to success in the Octagon in this edition of Warrior Code.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 CURLING SHOTS

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC295ProchazkavsPereira
programme.desc: UFC celebrates its 30th Anniversary at Madison Square Garden with an epic championship doubleheader. Former light heavyweight champion Jiri Prochazka battles former middleweight champ Alex Pereira for the vacant light heavyweight crown, plus Sergei Pavlovich and Tom Aspinall face off for the interim heavyweight title. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep12
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep11
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep11

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
